name: Swamy Ananthanarayan
content: Swamy Ananthanarayan - Monash University View Scopus Profile Swamy Ananthanarayan Dr Senior Lecturer, Department of Human Centred Computing https://orcid.org/0000-0002-9808-5844 EmailSwamy.Ananthanarayanmonashedu Accepting PhD Students 20102025 Research activity per year Personal profile BiographyI am interested in designing and evaluating interactive systems that address the needs of underserved or marginalized populations (e.g., older adults, children, indigenous groups, people with disabilities, low socioeconomic status groups). My research often takes the shape of tangible or physical technologies such as intelligent artifacts, ambient displays, computational toolkits or wearable devices.Some examples of my work include electronic toolkits for supporting healthy behaviors in low SES children, tangible programming environments for facilitating computational thinking, intergenerational storytelling platforms, and multimodal interfaces for bicycle safety. Expertise related to UN Sustainable Development Goals In 2015, UN member states agreed to 17 global Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) to end poverty, protect the planet and ensure prosperity for all. This person’s work contributes towards the following SDG(s): Education/Academic qualificationComputer Science and Cognitive Science, PhD, University of Colorado BoulderAward Date: 19 Dec 2015 Collaborations and top research areas from the last five years Recent external collaboration on country/territory level.
